description:
Souta is a transfer student to Hatagaya School who has the ability to see the fate of the people around him in the form of flags atop their heads. He can "break" the flags depending on his actions and thus change the fate of the people around him. Several weeks prior to the start of the series, he was the sole survivor of the Premium Ambriel (プレミアム・アンブリアル) a cruise ship that sank. There, he acquired the ability to see and alter flags from Sakura, who played a chess-like game with him during the cruise. He lives in the Quest Ryou (クエスト寮), a dorm with many beautiful girls.
He seeks his sister who was also aboard the Premium Ambriel.
name: Hatate Souta
